What is the exact scenario generating this exception ?

org/eclipse/tptp/platform/common/ui/internal/CommonUIMessages 

does not exist until TPTP 4.3.0+

and you reported 4.2.4 which does not exist. 

It seems to me that you have an workbench with level of plug-ins that is not compatible with each other. 

Did you install Eclipse 3.2.2 workbench and run update to install TPTP and it's dependencies?

While I stated before that "Eclipse reports no updates are available for any components at submission time", I have gone to the trouble to install a clean version of Eclipse.

I have used this link:
http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/download.php?file=/tptp/4.3.1/TPTP-4.3.1-200702221346/tptp.runtime.allInOne.win32.win32.x86-TPTP-4.3.1.zip

I ran the Update Manager

I filed bug 180345 against Eclipse (ugh)

Even avoiding that error by clicking the boxes at the higher levels, Eclipse also FAILS to perform the update, so I am unable to actually GET a clean and updated install in order to test this further... Once the Eclipse team fixes the other issues, this can be revisited.
Targetting to future but will aim to address in 4.5.
